text: Pehle apna niche research karen. Kis product ko bechenge?  Apna target audience kon hai?  Ek strong business plan banaye jismein yeh sab details hon.
Ek professional Shopify store banwayein.  User-friendly design aur fast loading speed bohat zaruri hain.  Apni branding ko strong rakhen.
Apni product ko kaise promote karenge?  Social media marketing, paid ads, influencer collaborations â€“ sab options explore karen aur ek effective strategy banaiye.
Sales track karein, customer feedback len, aur apni strategy mein changes lagate rahen.  Consistency key hai!  Apna business scale karein aur apna 1 crore ka target achieve karein!
